last_episode_to_air.name: Last Run
last_episode_to_air.overview: Newly appointed manager Jim has one week to prove his team deserves to come back for another season; Bobby meets with Joey to challenge Jim's promotion, but a hangover threatens his credibility; Lynsey gets fed up with hard-partying Texans.

name: Après Ski
overview: When the rich and famous want the ultimate winter ski vacation, they head to the posh resort town of Whistler, British Columbia, where breathtaking mountain adventures are rivaled only by extravagant off-slope festivities. Hoping to take the après scene to a new level is Canadian hospitality mogul Joey Gibbons, who recently launched travel concierge business Gibbons Life aimed at redefining the tourism industry.

episodes.name: No Business Like Snow Business
episodes.overview: Business mogul Joey Gibbons brings together a group of concierges to re-imagine the typical ski vacation; a trio of fun-loving clients do not want to go skiing; Jim cozies up to a woman while dog sledding; a hungover client panics on a gondola.

episodes.name: Cold Feet
episodes.overview: Elise and Tamara point fingers following a dining disaster on the gondola; Jim connects with six young clients; Kendra takes on a mountaintop vow renewal during which a wardrobe malfunction takes place and threatens to derail the ceremony.

episodes.name: Friends With Benefits
episodes.overview: Jim's injured knee is put to the test during an extreme adventure with snowboarding buddies; Bobby's new clients, who call themselves Vancouver Royalty, make requests that cause problems for Kendra.

episodes.name: It's All Down Hill From Here
episodes.overview: Reeling from Elise's accusations, Bobby relays his side of the story to Tamara; Kendra oversees a sexy photo shoot for clients; Lynsey's adventure skills are put to the test when a client gets cold feet; tempers flare at the weekly dinner.

episodes.name: Sliding Downhill
episodes.overview: When staff members go bobsledding, the leave someone in the dust, Bobby and Charlotte cater to high-maintenance holiday-makers, Kendra and Jim take their clients horseback riding, Jim's frustrations boil over; a team dinner goes downhill.

episodes.name: On Thin Ice
episodes.overview: Team morale goes downhill in the wake of Elise and Jim's argument; Kendra loses a family member; Jim oversees a mountain excursion with an Olympic champion and novice skiers; Tamara is forced to make some tough decisions about the future of the team.

episodes.name: Power Moves
episodes.overview: When a manager position opens up, Jim jumps in, but Bobby has other ideas about who should take over; two sets of clients push Jim's managerial skills to the limit; Kendra confronts Elise about their friendship.

episodes.name: Last Run
episodes.overview: Newly appointed manager Jim has one week to prove his team deserves to come back for another season; Bobby meets with Joey to challenge Jim's promotion, but a hangover threatens his credibility; Lynsey gets fed up with hard-partying Texans.
